definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

from/through/via/to follow/to obey/to engage in (an activity)/never (in negative sentence)/(Taiwan pr. [zong4]) retainer/assistant/auxiliary/subordinate/related by common paternal grandfather or earlier ancestor

sentences.english: I pointed out that the perception of a master-servant relationship should be removed.
sentences.chinese: 我也表明，马华必须去除和巫统的主从关系。

sentences.english: In reality almost no relationship is as clearly defined as master/student.
sentences.chinese: 实际上几乎没有关系可以清晰的界定主从角色。

sentences.english: Grasp planning is the most important subject of the master-slave dexterous hand grasping.
sentences.chinese: 抓持规划是灵巧手主从抓持的核心问题。

sentences.english: Relation between them is principal and subordinate, which cannot be reversed.
sentences.chinese: 两者之间是主从的关系，不能互相颠倒。

sentences.english: The paper presents Stackelberg games for the systems with coupling control variable.
sentences.chinese: 文章讨论了控制变量耦合的受限系统的主从对策问题。

sentences.english: Ain. Till the Lord regarded and looked down from the heavens.
sentences.chinese: 直到上主从天垂顾怜视。

sentences.english: Through the hardware and software collaborative work to improved overall system reliability, this paper also analysed the reliability of the system.
sentences.chinese: 设计了两路主从冗余控制，并分析了系统的可靠性。

sentences.english: There are threads for handling synchronization of master and slave servers for replication.
sentences.chinese: 一些线程用于处理主从服务器的同步，以便执行复制。

sentences.english: The master-slave mode improves the expandability.
sentences.chinese: 主从模式增强了系统的可扩展性。

sentences.english: The superior and subordinate Agents adopted the master-menial cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 上下级的CA间采用主从协作。

sentences.english: A master - slave data acquisition system based on DSP is designed.
sentences.chinese: 文中设计基于DSP的主从式MEIT数据采集系统。

sentences.english: The homeowner buys whatever remaining electric power he needs from the local utility.
sentences.chinese: 屋主从当地供电所购买他还需要的电量。

sentences.english: Studies the robust Stackelberg game of supply chain based on uncertain demand.
sentences.chinese: 研究了需求不确定条件下的供应链鲁棒主从对策问题。

definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
mutual exchange of assistance (idiom)/to reciprocate with material assistance
